description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Asparagus With Fresh Mozzarella & Balsamic Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled Asparagus With Fresh Mozzarella & Balsamic Glaze
name: Grilled Asparagus With Fresh Mozzarella & Balsamic Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a chargrill over high heat, or a barbecue until hot. Cook asparagus for 1-2 minutes each side or until lightly charred and tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Tear mozzarella into pieces and serve with asparagus. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with lemon rind and drizzle with balsamic glaze. Tip 1: Kick up the heat by sprinkling the asparagus with chilli flakes along with the salt and pepper. Tip 2: Juice the leftover lemon and freeze in ice-cube trays.
